title: How to write answers in an exam for an undergraduate student - Quora

response.answer_text: Your answers should demonstrate that you understand concepts and the ideas that were taught in class. When I have taught history and Humanities, I have several points we discussed in class that I am looking for in an exam answer to a discussion question. I recommend taking notes during class lectures and study your notes to prepare for the discussion/short answer questions on an exam. It’s important to note cause and effect as well as making connections between ideas.
